# indexInWindow(for:)

**Instance Method**

Called when the index of the tab in the window is needed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func indexInWindow(for context: WKWebExtensionContext) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **context**: The context in which the web extension is running.

## Discussion

This method should be implemented for better performance. Defaults to the window’s [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionWindow/tabs(for:)] method to find the index if not implemented.
